name: Space Runner (WhyNomi)
description:
Immerse yourself into the world of cosmic tranquility!  Collect crystals, complete all levels, find as many hidden crystals and levels as possible to open the best crew.... But only at the very end you’ll find out what exactly you have been looking for :)           Controls:  ·    Movemant:  A and D     ·     Jump:  Space   

The game is made with a free asset - Click here 😊

Music - Space Three
